price: 7. Yaa ka dulmi badan mid ka been sheega Alle isagoo loogu yeedho Islaamka? Alle ma hanuuniyo qoloda daalimiinta (gar ma qaatayaasha) ah.
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلۡكَذِبَ وَهُوَ يُدۡعَىٰٓ إِلَى ٱلۡإِسۡلَٰمِۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi al-kadhiba wahuwa yud'ʿā ilā al-is'lāmi wal-lahu lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
